articles.description: Listen to BBC Radio 5 Live commentary and follow live text updates as England host the Netherlands in the Women's Nations League.
articles.title: Women's Nations League: England v Netherlands build-up - radio & text

articles.description: India beat a much-changed Australia by 20 runs to complete a T20 series victory in Raipur.
articles.title: India beat Australia to seal T20 series win

articles.description: Ronnie O'Sullivan keeps his hopes of a record-extending eighth UK Championship crown alive with a courageous 6-5 comeback victory against Zhou Yuelong in York.
articles.title: O'Sullivan survives Zhou scare to reach UK semis

articles.description: Everton submit a formal appeal against an independent commission's decision to hand them an unprecedented 10-point Premier League deduction.
articles.title: Everton launch appeal against points deduction

articles.description: An arrest warrant is issued for Buffalo Bills linebacker Von Miller in a domestic violence case involving a pregnant woman.
articles.title: Arrest warrant issued for Buffalo Bills' Miller

articles.description: Williams confirm American Logan Sargeant will remain with the team next season, completing the 20-driver grid for 2024.
articles.title: Williams retain Sargeant to complete 2024 F1 grid

articles.description: Northern Ireland keep their hopes of progression to League A of the Women's Nations alive with a 4-0 win over Albania in Tirana.
articles.title: Magill nets twice as Northern Ireland beat Albania

articles.description: Wales coach Warren Gatland believes Owen Farrell's decision to step away from international rugby should be a "wake-up call for all of us".
articles.title: Farrell decision a 'wake-up call' - Gatland

articles.description: Mia Brookes, Penny Healey and Charlie McIntyre are shortlisted for the BBC Young Sports Personality of the Year award.
articles.title: Trio nominated for Young Sports Personality award

articles.description: Manchester United manager Erik ten Hag says goalkeeper Andre Onana is the Premier League's second-best goalkeeper "based on stats".
articles.title: 'Onana is second best in Premier League on stats'
